channel.title: How do i add pking to my server?
channel.description: it wont drop items when i pk. someone plz help and also does ne 1 know how to get barrages to work? i am using agspking source code.

item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Depends on your source. Could be in a seperate .java, could be hiding in your client.

item.title: How do i add pking to my server?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

So, for the first one, check what method you’re using in player on player combat (i.e. ApplyDead())

For barrages, check the packet for them, and you’ll probably notice it’s missing damage, graphics, etc.

Read full topic
